meanings.definition: Readily assuming different forms or characters; extremely variable.
meanings.sent1: The protean actor effortlessly transformed into various characters on stage.
meanings.sent2: Her protean talents allowed her to excel in many different fields.
meanings.sent3: The protean chameleon decided to try out being a flamingo for a day.
meanings.sent4: The protean nature of the weather made planning a picnic impossible.
meanings.sent5: The protean landscape shifted constantly, never looking the same twice.

meanings.sent1: The protean menu offered a wide range of delicious dishes to choose from.
meanings.sent2: The protean colors of the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful array.
meanings.sent3: The protean wardrobe of the fashion designer was always a topic of envy.
meanings.sent4: Her protean interests led her to explore different cultures and traditions.
meanings.sent5: The protean music playlist catered to everyone's tastes, from classical to pop.

meanings.sent1: The protean tool could be used for a variety of tasks around the house.
meanings.sent2: His protean skills made him an invaluable asset to the team.
meanings.sent3: The protean chef whipped up a new dish using unexpected ingredients.
meanings.sent4: She had a protean mind that could quickly grasp new concepts.
meanings.sent5: The protean athlete excelled in multiple sports, from swimming to basketball.
